= join_results.py =
- This is a tool to join multiple athena result tables together
- The tool uses source_id to join the columns together

== Example usage == 
1. python join_results.py
2. python join_results.py -r
    - using the -r flag will rename each "count" column in your csvs to the name of the file

= Setup: = 
Add all csv's to be joined together to the csvs folder
run script
